NoLogsChannel: Having not found a salon named `sam-logs`, I send you the proof here. Feel free to create a lounge called `sam-logs`!
NOP_Botowner: You can't use this command, it's reserved for my creator!
NOP_Guildban_members: You are not allowed to ban! *(BAN_MEMBERS)*
NOP_Guildkick_members: You are not allowed to kick! *(KICK_MEMBERS)*
NOP_Guildmanage_message: You are not allowed to use these command! *(MANAGE_MESSAGE)*
8ball-NoAsk: What do you want to ask? *(A minimum of three words must be indicated)*
8ball-Answer: My crystal ball tells me that....
ascii-TooManyCharacters: Please do not enter more than 12 characters.
ascii-NoArgs: Please indicate what you want to transform into ASCII format.
fish-F2: a fish, at the table! I'm hungry. 🐟
fish-F4: a boot... Eurk, throw that away. 👢
fish-F7: shells. Thanks, I'll do my decorating again. 🐚
fish-F9: WUT! But he's a cousin of WUMPUS! DROP IT! 🐋
fish-F10: A whale! Uh, I have a question: How could you not break your cane? 🐳
fish-F11: a turtle! Let her go! Let her go! 🐢
rps-TextChoose: Choose a reaction! *(If there are none, make sure I have permission to add reactions).
googlesearch-EmbedFooter: Click on the blue text to access the site
invite-EmbedField_Title: Click on one of the links below
help-EmbedDesc:
Welcome on the SamBot's documention
 My prefix is actually __**${botconfig.prefix}**__
${ON} ${f} Functional unit ${WIP} ${f} Unit under development, risk of bugs${OFF} ${f} Unusable unit
ban-NoUserMessage: Please indicate the user to be banned! *(You don't have to mention it). *
ban-defaultReason: ${bUser.user.tag} has been banned by ${message.author.tag} without giving a reason.
ban-UserBypassMessage: I'm sorry but I can't ban a moderator!
kick-NoUserMessage: Please indicate the user to be kicked! *(You don't have to mention it).*
kick-defaultReason: ${bUser.user.tag} has been kicked by ${message.author.tag} without giving a reason.
kick-UserBypassMessage: Je suis désolée mais je ne peux pas éjecter un modérateur !
poll-NoQuestion: Please indicate a question to ask!
purge-EmbedFooter: Messages that are 14 days old cannot be deleted, Discord told me so!
purge-BadArg2: Please indicate a number between 2 and 100.
serverinfo-VerificationLevels_Message2: **Low** ${f} Must have a verified email on their Discord account.
serverinfo-VerificationLevels_Message3: **Medium** ${f} Must also be registered on Discord for longer than 5 minutes.
serverinfo-VerificationLevels_Message4: **(╯°□°）╯︵ ┻━┻** ${f} Must also be a member of this server for longer than 10 minutes.
serverinfo-VerificationLevels_Message5: **┻━┻ ﾐヽ(ಠ益ಠ)ノ彡┻━┻** ${f} Must have a verified phone on their Discord account.
serverinfo-ExplicitContentLevels_Message: **Don't scan any messages.** ${f} Ain't no party like my grandma's tea party.
**Scan messages from members without role.** ${f} Recommended option for servers that use roles for trusted membership.
**Scan messages sent by all members.** ${f} Recommended option for when you want that squeakly clean shine.
serverinfo-AFKParameters_NoAFK_ChannelMe: The AFK lounge is not defined
serverinfo-AFKParameters_NoAFK_TimeoutMe: AFK is not activated on the server.
userinfo-IsBot_False: BIP. BOUP... It's not a Bot.
